text: Gary Michael Dubin (May 5, 1959 - October 8, 2016) was an American television, movie and voice actor. He was best known for his portrayal of Punky Lazaar, a friend of Danny's on The Partridge Family. He also voiced Toulouse in The Aristocats in 1970. He played the part of ill-fated teenager Eddie Marchant, who was eaten by the shark in Jaws 2. ==Other websites== Category:1959 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Gary Dubin
